scripts.install-pattern-lab: if [ ! -d pattern-lab ]; then composer create-project -n --keep-vcs --repository '{ "type": "vcs", "url": "https://github.com/aleksip/edition-php-twig-standard" }' drupal-pattern-lab/edition-twig-standard=dev-shila-drupal-theme pattern-lab && cd pattern-lab && php core/console -c --set sourceDir=../dist && php core/console -c --set twigAutoescape=0 && php core/console --generate && cd ..; fi
scripts.install-pattern-lab-development: if [ ! -d pattern-lab ]; then composer create-project -n --keep-vcs --repository '{ "type": "vcs", "url": "https://github.com/aleksip/edition-php-twig-development" }' drupal-pattern-lab/edition-development-twig=dev-shila-drupal-theme pattern-lab && cd pattern-lab && php core/console -c --set sourceDir=../dist && php core/console -c --set twigAutoescape=0 && php core/console --generate && cd ..; fi
